product_name: Sawyer Dragonfly Tale Canoe Paddle - Kids' 38"
long_description: Start young paddlers out right with the 38 in. Sawyer Dragonfly Tale canoe paddle. Lightweight and tough, it's made just for children. Features a lightweight, well-balanced, oval fir shaft with a fiberglass-reinforced pine blade. Back of paddle has lined columns so your kids can write down the destinations of their first canoe trips right on the paddle blade. Basic T-grip is easy for small hands to wrap around and control. Front of paddle blade features a dragonfly illustration. Paddle has a slightly bent 7-degree shaft. Small and compact size also makes this a perfect emergency paddle. Sawyer recommends the Dragonfly Tale canoe paddle for kids from 2 to 10 yrs. old.
short_description: Start young paddlers out right with the 38 in. Sawyer Dragonfly Tale canoe paddle. Lightweight and tough, it's made just for children.
